page.title: 04LAW AND ORDER PART ONE
page.content: Instead of Officers in Police cars, Stanway has a{Neighbourhood Beat {Officer (NBO).}His name is P.C.Humphries. He is part of our {community}and because he travels on foot or bike he sees more of what is happening. If you need help he is never far away. Part of job is being seen 'showing the flag' as he calls it. He has varied{duties}including investigating crime,checking properties,advising on security. As he knows everybody and they know him he can keep an eye on the elderly or those a risk. He is especially known by the local schoolchildren as he frequently visits schools to give talks about{crime and {safety.}He is also invited to local functions and tests the childrens cycling proficiency. {
